sentences.en: An option could be to redeploy to the border troops based in other areas of south Sudan.
sentences.cn: 他通过翻译说：“一种选择可能是重新部署南部苏丹其它地区的边境部队。

sentences.en: And now the drought in Sudan.
China buys most of Sudan's oil and sells it arms.
sentences.cn: 中国购买了苏丹的大部分石油并向其出售武器.

sentences.en: Civil war in the Sudan has been grinding on for nine years.
sentences.cn: 苏丹内战已经持续了9年之久。

sentences.en: Green, White Nile converge in Khartoum , Sudan, and then flows into Egypt.
sentences.cn: 青 、 白尼罗河在苏丹的喀土穆汇合, 然后流入埃及.

sentences.en: He came from the Sudan without a word of English at his command.
sentences.cn: 他来自苏丹地区，一句英语都不会。

sentences.en: It's prevalent in Congo and Liberiastand out swear, Sudan and elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 这在刚果、利比亚 、 苏丹和其他地方非常普遍.

sentences.en: LC - MS method for sudan red in eggs was established.
sentences.cn: 建立了禽蛋中苏丹红的液相色谱-质谱联用(LC -MS )检测方法.

sentences.en: Sudan even threat-ened to mobilize in response to the ultima-tums.
sentences.cn: 作为对最后通牒的回应，苏丹甚至威胁说要动员军队。

sentences.en: Sudan's president seen dancing and smiling after war crimes charges issued.
sentences.cn: 被看(见)跳舞和微笑着的苏丹总统在战争罪指控发出之后.

sentences.en: Surely not. It'should be the saber of tribe around North Africa or Sudan.
sentences.cn: 可以肯定不是狗腿, 应该是北非或苏丹那一带附近部族的短刀.

sentences.en: The IGAD region covers Djibouti, Eritrea, Ethiopia , Kenya, Somalia, Sudan, and Uganda.
sentences.cn: 伊加特所辖区域包括吉布提, 厄立特里亚, 埃塞俄比亚, 索马里, 苏丹和乌干达.

sentences.en: The remaining cases are found in Sudan and Ghana.
sentences.cn: 剩余的病症主要出现在苏丹和加纳.

sentences.en: Tombs and temples of ancient Egyptfollow the Nile well into Sudan . A.
sentences.cn: 古埃及的坟墓和寺庙跟随着尼罗河一直到苏丹.

sentences.en: We must do everything we can to promote peace in Sudan.
sentences.cn: 我们必须做任何我们可以做的是去提升苏丹的和平.

sentences.en: What is your idea of the life condition in Sudan?
sentences.cn: 你对苏丹人民的生活情况了解 多少 ?
